languages.text: "Боль — мой учитель, мой ритуальный кинжал. Она отсекает страхи и желания. Как резец, ограняет волю и рефлексы. Для чего избегать ее? Не понимаю".

traits.locale_text: "Боль — мой учитель, мой ритуальный кинжал. Она отсекает страхи и желания. Как резец, ограняет волю и рефлексы. Для чего избегать ее? Не понимаю".

languages.text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
languages.original_text: "Боль — мой учитель, мой ритуальный кинжал. Она отсекает страхи и желания. Как резец, ограняет волю и рефлексы. Для чего избегать ее? Не понимаю".

traits.locale_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
"Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
"Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
"Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
"Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
"Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."

languages.text: «El dolor es mi maestro; mi arma ritual. Corta todo miedo y deseo. Como un cincel, esculpe la voluntad y los reflejos. ¿Qué motivo hay para evitarlo? No lo entiendo».
languages.original_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."

languages.text: 「痛みは我の教師であり、儀式のダガーです。恐怖と欲望を切り取ってくれるのです。ノミのように、意志と反射神経に磨きをかける。それを避ける理由がどこにあるのです？理解ができません」
languages.original_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."

languages.text: “痛苦是我的导师，也是我的仪式匕首。它能消灭恐惧和欲望。它就像雕刻刀一样，可以磨炼意志与反应。有什么理由要避免痛苦呢？我无法理解。”
languages.original_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."

languages.text: "Schmerz ist mein Lehrer, mein ritueller Dolch. Er entfernt alle Ängste und Begierden. Wie ein Meißel formt er den Willen und Reflexe. Welchen Grund hätte es, ihn zu meiden? Das verstehe ich nicht."
languages.original_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."

languages.text: « La douleur est mon maître, ma dague rituelle. Elle élimine tout sentiment de peur ou de désir. Tel un ciseau, elle aiguise la volonté et les réflexes. Pourquoi l'éviter ? Je ne comprends pas. »
languages.original_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
"Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."

languages.text: "Acı benim öğretmenim, ayin hançerimdir. Korkuları ve arzuları kesip atar. Keski gibi iradeyi ve refleksleri biler. Bundan kaçınmak için bir sebep mi var? Anlamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Pain is my teacher, my ritual dagger. It cuts away fears and desires. Like a chisel, it hones the will and reflexes. What reason is there to avoid it? I do not understand."
